entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 1:30 PM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers or drizzle. High 8.
